unnormalised: Borem, tumi loan kaddche vixim sochotat? Mast! Tem thoddem bhirantichem disonk xokta, mhaka kollta. Punn mhajeacher visvas dovrat, Bharatantlean loan ani credit-achem mulbodh somzon ghevn tumkam odhik hushar arthik nirnnoy gheunk boll mellonk xokta. Chol, ami tem tukdde-tukdde kortam, desi style-an!
normalised: Bore, tumi karjekarachea babtin ulo kortat? Thond! Tem thoddem trasachem dista, maka tem kollta. Punn maka visvas asa, Bharotant karje ani patrechem mullavem ginean tumak chotur arthik nirnnoi gheunk sakxom korunk xakta. Ami tem toddunk dium, desi xailyent!

unnormalised: Poilem mukhiel vost, interest rate-ancher uloyam. Tumkam "9% p.a." hacho ul'lekh distolo. "p.a." mhunttlear "per annum," vo dor vorsa. Tench percent bank tumchea koddsun duddu vhaddi korun gheunk lavta. Veg-vegllea loan-ank veg-veglle rate astale. Udahoronnak, ek personal loan-achea rate home loan-anchea rate-antle odhik asonk xokta. Dor bankanche offer compare korat. HDFC, SBI, ICICI – soglleanche quotes gheiat!
normalised: Poilem poilem, ami viajachea daran vixim ulo korum-ia. Tumhi "nove tokke p.a." hea bhaxentlean ulo kortat tem tumkam distolem. "p.a." mhonnge "dor vorsak," vo dor vorsak. Bank tumchea kodlean poishe udhar gheuche khatir gheta ti tokddi. Vegveglle karjekarank vegveglle dor astat. Udharonnachich, eka veaktigat karjekarak ghara karjekara poros unch dor asunk xakta. Sogleo bankancheo bhovonneo tulna korat. H-D-F-C, S-B-I, I-C-I-C-I – soglleankoddenlean kimot gheiat!

unnormalised: Ani magir asa EMI – Equated Monthly Instalment. Hem asa nischit duddu jem tumi dor mhoinea loan-ak bhortole. Tantun aslolo asl’lo duddu (jem tumi khorem duddu vhaddi kel’lem) ani interest. Tumi online EMI calculator vaprunk zatat (kitlinch asat!) jem tumkam tumchea dor mhoineache duddu dakhoytle, koso ₹5,00,000-ak 10% interest rate-an 5 vorsank. Tench tumchea budget-acher yojon korunk modot korta!
normalised: Uprant, E-M-I asa – Saman Masik Hapti. Hem tumi dor mhoinneak tumchea karjekara khatir bhorpache tharavik rokkm. Tantunt mull rokkm (tumi udhar ghetlele khore poishe) ani viaj asat. Tumhi onlain E-M-I kenkulatoracho vapor korunk xaktat (tanchea bhartat!) eka karjekarachea masik bhurgeache dar kitem astolem tem pollounk, mhonnche ponch lakh rupiye ponch vorsanche khatir dha tokkeachea doran. Tem tumchem bajeek yevzon korunk modot korta!

unnormalised: CIBIL score. Hem khub mhotvachem! Tumcho CIBIL score ek 3-ankddi ankddo asa jem tumchi credit yogyota uktayta. Ek boro score sadharonn ponnan 750+ mantat. Bank tumcho loan approve korche adim hem check kortat. Zori tumcho score komi asa (uchit credit card bhortuk chuklear vo adlea loan-acher defaulting kelear), tumkam loan approve korunk tras zatolo vo tumkam vhodd interest rate offer korunk xoktat. Tumi tumcho CIBIL score vegllea website-ancher fukotant check korunk zatat.
normalised: C-I-B-I-L skor. Hem khub mhotvachem! Tumcho C-I-B-I-L skor ek tin ankddhyacho ankddo asa zo tumchi patreta dakoita. Ek boro skor sadharonnponnan satxe ponchattor odik mantat. Bank tumchem karjekar mandun gheuche poilim tem sodta. Tumcho skor komi asa zalear (kadchit uzo karjekar bhorpacho usir zalelean vo poilelea karjekaracher chuklelean), tumkam karjekar mandun gheunk tras zaunk xakta vo tumkam odik viajachea doracho adesh diunk xakta. Tum tumcho C-I-B-I-L skor vichitr vebsaittacher fulkattt gheunk xakta.

unnormalised: Atam, ami vegllea loan-anchea prokarancher uloyam. Thoddim personal loans, home loans, education loans, vehicle loans, ani gold loans-ui asat! Dor ek prokar ek nirdharit hetu khatir toyar kel’la ani tache sovem sovant astale ani niyam ani sharti. Udahoronnak, zori Priya-k Mumbai-ant ₹80 lakh kimmotichem flat vhaddi korchem asa, ti LIC Housing Finance-antle home loan-ak vochunk xokta.
normalised: Atam, ami vegvegllea toreanchea karjekaran vixim ulo korum-ia. Thoin veaktigat karjekaram asat, ghara karjekaram, xikxon karjekaram, gaddi karjekaram, ani sonnachea karjekaram legit! Dor ek torechi dharonn ek vichitr hetuche khatir kel'li asa ani tancheo veglleo xarti ani niyom asat. Udharonnachich, Priya-k Mumbai-nt assi lakh rupiyeanchem ghor gheunk zai zalear, ti L-I-C ghor sandnyachean ghara karjekar gheunk xakta.

unnormalised: Credit cards dusrem credit-achem rup. Tankam hus’harponnan vaprat! Kantar korunch doddounk naka chintunk nastana. Tumchea bill-ank velecher ani purnn ponnan bhortat bodde interest charges tallonk. Zaite lok fokot komi duddu bhortat (mhunnlear, ₹500 ek ₹5000 bill-acher), punn magir tumi azun interest charges vaddoun ghetat. Hem kednach sonponk naslelea chakri bhaxen!
normalised: Kredit kard hem legit eka torechem patrechem sadhon. Tankam choturaichean vaprat! Konnachim vichar korinastana svaiip kortat tem chukunaka. Vhodd viajachi chorai nasunk tumchim billa temacher bhorat ani ful'lich bhorat. Zaite zann fakt komitkomi rokkm bhorotat (mhonnche ponch lakhache billant ponchxe rupiye), punn tantuntlean tum viajachi chorai vaddoitat. Ti kadich sopunk nazo oxem cholta!

unnormalised: Tumim konn’nach loan-ak tharav korche adim, bori auksudhent *khub* dhyan dium. Fees, charges ani prepayment penalties somzat. Tumkam loan poilim bhortolear kitem zatolem? Konniche lipovn dovrtlele kharch asat? Saval vicharat! Tumkam kitem tori kallzachem na zalear spoxtt korunk bhienakaat. Gyan mhunttlear shokti, mhoje ixtta.
normalised: Tumi konnachea karjekaran vochit zaunche poilim, bariksannachean print vachat. Fisa, chorai ani mukhar sandnyachea sokaiank somzun gheiat. Tumi lokddem karjekar udentek bhorpak zai zalear kitem zata? Kitim tori lipounk dourol'le poishe asat? Prost utrat! Konnachea babtint tumi nischit nhui tachi vatti korkanaka. Ginean mhonnche xokti, mhojea ixtta.

unnormalised: Loans ani credit tumchea arthik ud’dishtancho hetu sadonk modot korunk zatat, ghor vhaddi korun, dhandho suru korun, vo uchye shikxon sodhun. Punn tankam zommedari-ui yeta. Zommedarponnan duddu vhaddi korat, tumchea arthik vevaharachem neett cholouk korat, ani dor velecher tumchim bhortukam bhortat. Ani ugddas dovrat, thodde research khub pois vhoddta! Tumi sadhya kortole!
normalised: Karjekar ani patrechi tumchi arthik upeogsiddhi bhoraunk modot korunk xaktat, tumi ghor ghetat, dhandho survat kortat vo vhoddlean xiktat tem. Punn tim zankai vaprunk zata. Jinnenddarponnan udhar gheiat, tumchem zankai nettoin zanat ani tumche poishe velar bhorat. Ani ugddas dovrat, thodde sondurbho zaite vell darta! Tumkam tem xakta!
